verses.verse: <S%G1377>Pursue<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G2206>desire<s%> <S%G2206>earnestly<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> [gifts,] but <S%G3123>especially<s%> that you may <S%G4395>prophesy.<s%>

For one who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue<s%> does not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to <S%G444>men,<s%> but to <S%G2316>God;<s%> for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G191>understands,<s%> but in [his] <S%G4151>spirit<s%> he <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries.<s%>
But one who <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> for <S%G3619>edification<s%> and <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> and <S%G3889>consolation.<s%>
One who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G3618>edifies<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%> but one who <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G3618>edifies<s%> the <S%G1577>church.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G2309>wish<s%> that you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> but [even] <S%G3123>more<s%> that you would <S%G4395>prophesy;<s%> and <S%G3173>greater<s%> is one who <S%G4395>prophesies<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> one who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G1329>interprets,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G1577>church<s%> may <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

But <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G2980>speaking<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G5623>profit<s%> you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you <S%G2228>either<s%> by <S%G1722>way<s%> of <S%G602>revelation<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1322>teaching<s%>?

<S%G3676>Yet<s%> [even] <S%G895>lifeless<s%> <S%G895>things,<s%> <S%G1535>either<s%> <S%G836>flute<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2788>harp,<s%> in <S%G1325>producing<s%> a <S%G5456>sound,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they do not <S%G1325>produce<s%> a <S%G1293>distinction<s%> in the <S%G5353>tones,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will it be <S%G1097>known<s%> what is <S%G832>played<s%> on the <S%G832>flute<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> on the <S%G2789>harp<s%>?
For <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G4536>bugle<s%> <S%G1325>produces<s%> an <S%G82>indistinct<s%> <S%G5456>sound,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> will <S%G3903>prepare<s%> himself for <S%G4171>battle<s%>?

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G1325>utter<s%> by the <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> that is <S%G2154>clear,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will it be <S%G1097>known<s%> what is <S%G2980>spoken<s%>? For you will be <S%G2980>speaking<s%> into the <S%G109>air.<s%>

There are, <S%G5177>perhaps,<s%> a <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G1085>kinds<s%> of <S%G5456>languages<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> [kind] is <S%G880>without<s%> <S%G880>meaning.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G1411>meaning<s%> of the <S%G5456>language,<s%> I shall be to the one who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> a <S%G915>barbarian,<s%> and the one who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> will be a <S%G915>barbarian<s%> to me.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> you, <S%G1893>since<s%> you are <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of <S%G4151>spiritual<s%> [gifts,] <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G4052>abound<s%> for the <S%G3619>edification<s%> of the <S%G1577>church.<s%>
<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> let one who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> that he may <S%G1329>interpret.<s%>
For <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G4336>pray<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G4336>prays,<s%> but my <S%G3563>mind<s%> is <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> is [the outcome] <S%G3767>then<s%>? I shall <S%G4336>pray<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and I shall <S%G4336>pray<s%> with the <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> I shall <S%G5567>sing<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and I shall <S%G5567>sing<s%> with the <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G1893>Otherwise<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2127>bless<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> [only,] <S%G4459>how<s%> will the one who <S%G378>fills<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> of the <S%G2399>ungifted<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G281>"Amen<s%>" at your <S%G2169>giving<s%> of <S%G2169>thanks,<s%> <S%G1894>since<s%> he does not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you are <S%G3004>saying<s%>?
For you are <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G2573>enough,<s%> but the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2087>man<s%> is not <S%G3618>edified.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> than you <S%G3956>all;<s%>

<S%G235>however,<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%> I <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> with my <S%G3563>mind,<s%> that I may <S%G2727>instruct<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2228>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3463>ten<s%> <S%G3463>thousand<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue.<s%>

<S%G80>Brethren,<s%> do not be <S%G3813>children<s%> in your <S%G5424>thinking;<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> in <S%G2549>evil<s%> be <S%G3515>babes,<s%> but in your <S%G5424>thinking<s%> be <S%G5046>mature.<s%>

In the <S%G3551>Law<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "By <S%G2084>men<s%> of <S%G2084>strange<s%> <S%G2084>tongues<s%> and by the <S%G5491>lips<s%> of <S%G2087>strangers<s%> I will <S%G2980>speak<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%> and <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> they will not <S%G1522>listen<s%> to Me," <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> <S%G5620>then<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> are for a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> not to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe,<s%> but to <S%G571>unbelievers;<s%> but <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> [is for a sign], not to <S%G571>unbelievers,<s%> but to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> should <S%G4905>assemble<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and <S%G2399>ungifted<s%> <S%G2399>men<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G571>unbelievers<s%> <S%G1525>enter,<s%> will they not <S%G3004>say<s%> that you are <S%G3105>mad<s%>?

But <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy,<s%> and an <S%G571>unbeliever<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G2399>ungifted<s%> <S%G2399>man<s%> <S%G1525>enters,<s%> he is <S%G1651>convicted<s%> by <S%G3956>all,<s%> he is <S%G350>called<s%> to <S%G350>account<s%> by <S%G3956>all;<s%>

the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of his <S%G2588>heart<s%> are <S%G5318>disclosed;<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> he will <S%G4098>fall<s%> on his <S%G4383>face<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G518>declaring<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3689>certainly<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you.

<S%G5101>What<s%> is [the outcome] <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>? <S%G3752>When<s%> you <S%G4905>assemble,<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5568>psalm,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G602>revelation,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G2058>interpretation.<s%> Let <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> for <S%G3619>edification.<s%>

<S%G1535>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in a <S%G1100>tongue,<s%> [it should be] by <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> at the <S%G4183>most<s%> <S%G5140>three,<s%> and [each] in <S%G3313>turn,<s%> and let <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1329>interpret;<s%>

but <S%G1437>if<s%> there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1328>interpreter,<s%> let him <S%G4601>keep<s%> <S%G4601>silent<s%> in the <S%G1577>church;<s%> and let him <S%G2980>speak<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> and to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And let <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and let the <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G1252>pass<s%> <S%G1252>judgment.<s%>
But <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G601>revelation<s%> is <S%G601>made<s%> to <S%G243>another<s%> who is <S%G2521>seated,<s%> let the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4601>keep<s%> <S%G4601>silent.<s%>

For you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G2596>one<s%> <S%G1520><s%> by <S%G2596>one,<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> may <S%G3129>learn<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> may be <S%G3870>exhorted;<s%>
and the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G4396>prophets<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G4396>prophets;<s%>
for <S%G2316>God<s%> is not [a God] of <S%G181>confusion<s%> but of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> as in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

Let the <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G4601>keep<s%> <S%G4601>silent<s%> in the <S%G1577>churches;<s%> for they are not <S%G2010>permitted<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> but let them <S%G5293>subject<s%> themselves, <S%G2531>just<s%> as the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>says.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> let them <S%G1905>ask<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> at <S%G3624>home;<s%> for it is <S%G150>improper<s%> for a <S%G1135>woman<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> in <S%G1577>church.<s%>
Was it from you that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> [first] <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> has it <S%G2658>come<s%> to you <S%G3441>only<s%>?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1380>thinks<s%> he is a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> let him <S%G1921>recognize<s%> that the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you are the Lord's <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> does not <S%G50>recognize<s%> [this], he is not <S%G50>recognized.<s%>
<S%G5620>Therefore,<s%> my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2206>desire<s%> <S%G2206>earnestly<s%> to <S%G4395>prophesy,<s%> and do not <S%G2967>forbid<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> in <S%G1100>tongues.<s%>
But let <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G2156>properly<s%> and in an <S%G5010>orderly<s%> <S%G5010>manner.<s%>
